title: Trump Shared an Image of Maduro Blindfolded and Handcuffed
The Trump Administration Approved a Big Lithium Mine. A Top Official’s Husband Profited.
summary: Karen Budd-Falen, the No. 3 at the Interior Department, didn’t disclose a $3.5 million water-rights contract between her husband and the developers of a Nevada mine, records show.

title: Why Haven’t Trump’s Tariffs Had a Bigger Impact?
summary: Steep import taxes have raised prices and affected U.S. businesses, but not quite as much as expected. A new report offers some reasons.

title: Mamdani Acts on Vow to Protect Renters With Move Against a Big Landlord
summary: Mayor Zohran Mamdani said New York City would intervene in the Pinnacle Group’s bankruptcy case. Tenants have long complained about living conditions in the company’s properties.

title: An ‘Avoidable Tragedy’: The Hazards That Led to the Swiss Fire Disaster
summary: The fire that killed at least 40 people in a Swiss bar on New Year’s Day was made more likely by apparent flaws in the site’s design and management, experts say.

title: Managers of Swiss Bar Are Suspected of Negligence in Deadly Fire, Police Say
summary: Swiss authorities say the fire was probably sparked by small fireworks on champagne bottles that ignited foam insulation on the bar’s basement ceiling.

title: Bryan Kohberger’s Family Stayed Silent for Years. Until Now.
summary: Since the arrest of Bryan Kohberger in the murder of four college students, a case that captivated the nation, his family has stayed silent. His sister now describes their pain and confusion.

title: Angie Katsanevas Went From Real Housewives Outsider to the Center Snowflake
summary: Angie Katsanevas has carved her own path through life, and her deadly quips on “The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City” have made her a breakout star.

title: 5 Workouts for Complete Beginners
summary: Looking for a new fitness routine this January? Start here.

title: 5 Fitness Resolutions That Have Nothing to Do With Weight Loss
summary: This year, set a goal that can actually help you sustain an exercise habit.

title: Trump’s Attack on Venezuela Is Illegal and Unwise
summary: We know that Mr. Trump’s warmongering violates the law.

title: To Trump, on Venezuela: You Break It, You Own It
summary: His administration just decapitated the country’s leadership; he’s now responsible for what comes next there.

title: An Operation in Venezuela
summary: President Trump announced that U.S. forces had captured Venezuela’s president, Nicolás Maduro, following a “large-scale attack.”

title: Why Security Guarantees Are So Crucial, and Thorny, for Ukraine
summary: While Kyiv has reported progress in negotiations, and is accelerating talks in the coming days, major questions remain unresolved about which countries will provide what kind of security for how long.

title: Hannah Dugan, Wisconsin Judge Convicted of Obstructing Immigration Agents, Resigns
summary: Hannah C. Dugan, a state court judge, was convicted by a jury in federal court. Wisconsin lawmakers called on her to resign from the bench.

title: Federal Appeals Court Says California Open-Carry Ban Is Unconstitutional
summary: A Ninth Circuit panel said the ban ran afoul of a 2022 Supreme Court ruling that required courts to evaluate gun laws based on the country’s “historical tradition of firearm regulation.”
